about_the_game:
Unleash the Chaos in Clash of Busts!

Step into the zany world of Clash of Busts, a thrilling multiplayer shooter where creativity and combat collide. Choose your character, customize with vibrant skins and dazzling effects, and dive into epic battles against players from around the globe.

Weapons That Pack a Punch

Wield an arsenal of unconventional weaponry designed for maximum mayhem. From the explosive Rocket Launcher to the unpredictable Milk and devastating Rail Guns, every weapon offers a unique way to outsmart and outgun your opponents.

Customize Your Style

Express yourself with a vast selection of skins and effects. Stand out in battle and make your mark as the most stylish combatant on the field.

Key Features:

  • Multiplayer mayhem with up to 8 players.

  • Fun and creative weaponry like Milk, Grenade Launchers, and more.

  • Diverse maps with unique themes and layouts.

  • Customization options for character.

  • Fast-paced gameplay for casual and competitive players alike.

Whether you're a lone wolf or a team player, Clash of Busts offers an unforgettable mix of chaos, strategy, and style. Ready to take on the challenge? Jump into the action today and show the world what you’re made of!

name: Clash of Busts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: R5 1200 or i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 or GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Clash of Busts is a multiplayer shooter where players battle it out with quirky weapons like Rocket, Milk and Rail Guns across diverse arenas. Customize your character with unique skins and effects, and dominate maps like Desert, Medieval, The Cave, and Winter Arena. Let the chaos begin!
